text: US to Boost Number of Refugees it Will Admit in 2017 NBCNews.com The Obama administration is pressing ahead with plans to boost the number of refugees it will allow into the U.S. as a national debate rages over immigration and security. The increase to 110,000 represents a nearly 30 percent increase over the current …
